location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Sir George Hilaro Barlow, Baronet, Governor and President in Council, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing three sets of exchanges for the part subsidy for Persia for the year 1810, as per the instructions for Sir Harford Jones [Brydges]. Only one of these is transcribed in the volume; a first of exchange in favour of Mahomed Ibrahim. The exchanges not transcribed are in favour of Mirza Tyamoon and Hajee Esmail respectively.
